resources.string: Please fill out your personal details.
Password (you will need this password if you want to have access to your connectivity information online)

This application collects location and wireless environment (WiFi) information from the phone. The information is stored on the phone and on the Google Cloud, and the access is granted to the instructors of, and students registered for the Mobile and Ubiquitous Computing class at FRI, Ljubljana, Slovenia, and solely for educational and research purposes. In case the analysis of the data is published. the results will not refer to any single individual and will not reveal participants\' identities. You have the right to uninstall the application at any point, and, if you wish, all the collected data that relates to you will be destroyed. By clicking the \"Register\" button below, you confirm that you have read and understood the above information.
